name: Kagikko Adventure
description:
Genre: Sugoroku game (board game)

The purpose of the game: To arrives at the goal earlier than a partner player.

How to Play games

(1)Let's look for a key

(2)Go to the goal with the key

(3)Open a treasure chest      ⇒ Goal !!

※Even if a partner player takes the key earlier, it is all right.    Tackle the partner player and you can get the key.
